content: First, the percentage of orders under $1,000 increased to 47% of the total in the fourth quarter, up from 44% in the third quarter and 43% a year ago. And one moment for our next question, please. And one moment for our next question, please. So we are seeing this barbell effect Overall, the percentage of orders in the marketplace that are $1,000 and below increased from, I think it was 44% to 47% in the fourth quarter.
